alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Gates of the Mountains; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Meagher County Valleys; Snowy and Judith Mountains; Southern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 30 at 2:34PM MDT until March 31 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central Montana. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
